alert.note: Alert for Caswell; Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 2:13PM EST until January 12 at 3:22AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Blacksburg VA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina...Virginia... Dan River near STP near Danville affecting Pittsylvania, City of Danville, Caswell and Rockingham independent cities. .Several inches of rain fell Tuesday into Wednesday. Excessive runoff on saturated ground continues to cause minor flooding along the lower portion of the Dan and the Roanoke River basins. For the Dan River...including Wentworth, Danville, Dan River at Paces, South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast to continue. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. Updates will be issued as needed until the flooding has ended.late tonight at 330 AM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNITL 600 PM EST... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Dan River near STP near Danville. * WHEN...Until 600 PM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Flooding begins at River District Towers. Minor flooding along River Street begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM EST Thursday the stage was 21.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 17.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:45 PM EST Thursday was 22.8 feet. The river has crested and is falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 6.9 feet by Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - For additional information please go to http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
